DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study JTT-130 Obese Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have type 2 diabetes ; 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) > 27.0 kg/m2 ≤ 45.0 kg/m2 ; 3 . Does meet medication restriction criterion , describe protocol .
